title: Implement 3-pane layout structure in View()
description:
Implement the main View() function with 3-pane layout:

Layout structure (top-to-bottom):
┌─────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ Status Bar (1-2 lines)                  │
├──────────────────┬──────────────────────┤
│ Task List        │ Output/Details       │
│ (fixed width)    │ (flexible width)     │
│                  │                      │
├──────────────────┴──────────────────────┤
│ Footer (help hints)                     │
└─────────────────────────────────────────┘

Dimensions:
- Status bar: full width, 2 lines (title + progress)
- Task list: fixed 35 chars wide, remaining height
- Output pane: remaining width, remaining height
- Footer: full width, 1 line

Use lipgloss.JoinVertical for main layout
Use lipgloss.JoinHorizontal for left/right panes

Call individual render functions:
- renderStatusBar()
- renderTaskPane()
- renderOutputPane()
- renderFooter()
- renderHelpOverlay() if showHelp
- renderCompleteOverlay() if showComplete
